DocAttribute.Name: NumberOfRiser
DocAttribute.Documentation: Number of the risers included in the stair flight.

DocAttribute.Name: NumberOfTreads
DocAttribute.Documentation: Number of treads included in the stair flight.

DocAttribute.Name: RiserHeight
DocAttribute.Documentation: Vertical distance from tread to tread. The riser height is supposed to be equal for all stairs in a stair flight.

DocAttribute.Name: TreadLength
DocAttribute.Documentation: Horizontal distance from the front to the back of the tread. The tread length is supposed to be equal for all steps of the stair flight.
